website_summaries.verdict: Motorcycle panniers that emphasize durability and good looks.
pros: Soft body construction makes these bags compressible and sturdy if dropped
Squared-off shape makes the pair more spacious than many budget motorbike panniers
cons: The inside capacity of the bags runs on the smaller side compared to most premium options

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit just behind tail lights on a sprortster
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Bag Stops just behind tail lights on a sprortster. Nice braided trim. They look like real leather! Definitely big enough for jackets, drinks, pistols, road kill, and two house cats!
customer_reviews.author: Barron Von Limestone (tymn)

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these for my 1200 Sportster and they work great. Once you get the bags adjusted for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 1200 Sportster and they work great. Once you get the bags adjusted for the right length they hang just right and look very good on the bike. I mounted them without a set of saddlebag supports at this point, but I may install some supports after a few more rides, I want to see how they do first.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Look good but a little small
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and the product has some nice little features like inside flaps for rain protection and nice buckles. One issue is the the clips are very tight and not simple to close and the original tie down was challenging with all the strings and no real direction. So far so good happy enough and good price for the decent quality
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Burke

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of the bags themselves for the price, just had to punch a couple more holes in the yoke to get them to sit far enough away from my exhaust. That said it was minimal effort for something that's universal. I also decided to get some saddle bag support brackets and it really pulled everything together for a nice clean look!
customer_reviews.author: Micheal A. Skinner

customer_reviews.title: What a great company! Willie & Max
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these for my Honda Rebel 250 last year, and they fit perfectly and have worked great for me. They look really good on the bike too. Recently, one of the quick-release clips cracked and I contacted Willie & Max about ordering replacement clips. They quickly offered to send replacements free of charge even though I was happy to pay. I miss companies like this, there aren't many like this left around anymore. Buying another bike this year, and will only get Willie & Max again! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: G-Man69

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off for these and the Willie/Max
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my Sportster. Definitely large, cramped if you plan on riding (2) up. With (2) up they go past the rear turn signals. It is doable and roomy for a road trip. I also ordered the Willie & Max. They are small but I usually ride (1) up and they hold my air pump, flat tire repair kit etc. I have a sissy bar bag for larger items. So I throw on whichever bag I need at the time. Easy on and off for these and the Willie/Max
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: used to have this brand back in 2006
customer_reviews.text: got a better setup in 2020 on my new bike I love these bags, I don't have the saddlebag supports but I've not had any issues, would deff recommend this bag company, just wish I could fit larger bags on my Suzuki S40 but small bikes for small guys I guess we are limited lol
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, ***BUY SUPPORT BRACKET SET!***
customer_reviews.text: Great fit on my 2008 Harley Sportster XL1200L . Great quality. ***Suggest purchasing saddlebag support bracket set***, otherwise bottom of bags tilt in against drive sprocket & brake disc assembly. Very happy with these bags!
customer_reviews.author: "Mel" O.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for smaller motorcycles
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought a Honda Rebel 250 just to buzz down to the corner store on; he needed something just to hold a few small items at a time. These look great, were easy to install, and work exactly as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for smaller bikes!
customer_reviews.text: Great saddlebags! They fit my 2005 Honda Shadow Spirit 750 perfectly. You are not going to pack a ton in them, but they help when going on day trips (I still use a backpack in addition for longer day trips) or running quick errands.
customer_reviews.author: AllTattedUpJay

customer_reviews.title: Very well made saddle bags
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was made as a gift for my father. He was more than pleased and frequently commented on well made the bags are. He is very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of saddlebags, good size, very pleased with fit for my 2012 Harley 883L.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time purchasing these
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a pair of these on another motorcycle. I was impressed how nice they looked, ease to open/close. I sold that motorcycle and purchased another one that I put these on. Because of previous experience, I knew what to expect: Perfect size, style and ease to use.
customer_reviews.author: Don St.John

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Willie and Max bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love Willie and Max bags. They are tough and durable, I have had three sets on three different bikes. They fit my 2011 Dyna Super Glide perfectly. (After I re-located the turn signals)
customer_reviews.author: George R. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The piece the bags zip to was missing, with no way to contact seller. Could only request refund/return Good material. Sturdy bags. A shame.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn J

customer_reviews.title: very nice, and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Look good, easy to install. Reasonably priced, but would recommend to use saddle bag stays, and tie down.
customer_reviews.author: ebk02

customer_reviews.title: It's Willie & Max !! You see what you will be getting and you get what you see. Good piece,good price!
customer_reviews.text: One cannot go wrong with Willie & Max...at least from my experience. Solid and exactly what I wanted and expected!
customer_reviews.author: E.D.

customer_reviews.title: These are nice little saddle bags
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little saddle bags for my 750cc motorcycle. Small, don't carry much but will hold some important riding basis. I'm glad i got them.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags at excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bags. Just the right size for my Suzuki Boulevard. Construction is solid and throwover mount works well. Just bought the matching Sissy bar bag to complete the look. Great product and excellent customer service. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Duffield

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a set of bags .
customer_reviews.text: Needed new bags for my bike and these fit great on my Honda Shadow . Good quality , and a Good price. Fast delivery .
customer_reviews.author: pcpower

customer_reviews.title: I have a 09 Vstar 950, Visually they fit good with the bike
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is they don’t give you any instructions on basic setup with piece of crap shoelaces they give you to tie the bags together. I had to rig it together with some thicker rope under the rear seat in order for the bags not to flap. Otherwise it looks pretty good on my Vstar.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality bags, had to move my rear turn signals to accommodate, but that would have been the same for any bag that I put on my Shadow Spirit 1100
customer_reviews.author: Cyclonus

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but small
customer_reviews.text: I ride a Honda Shadow 750 and it fits well. Had to punch a few extra holes so I could tie it to the right height, but not a big deal. Looks great and seems to be well made. The space is smaller than I thought so consider buying the next size up, especially if you have a bigger bike than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These look and work great but they're a little too small.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K.

customer_reviews.title: Good bags for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bags fit my 650 Savage perfect. No need to move tailights. I had a standout chrome support that was used for my old bags and it worked out well for supporting these.I also liked the plastic inserts that help keep the bags shape well. Extra flaps in the top keep things dry too.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey M.

customer_reviews.title: Compact saddle bags
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags, a bit small on my Honda 750 Magna. Of course, it says "compact". Might be better on a 250-500 range bike. Good quality and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Putbrese

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, length
customer_reviews.text: These bags were built for my Harley Sportster. Perfect size, length, no issues at all. Super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, my boyfriend didn't like the braiding. Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great bags could have something better to tie to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bags could have something better to tie to the bike frame so as not to bounce around I just used black zip ties
customer_reviews.author: Tony Trammel

customer_reviews.title: Good bags
customer_reviews.text: Good bags. Little big for my 17 iron but I made it work
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: The product was well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product was well made and sturdy. Didn't fit right on my Yamaha VStar 250. Would have to make modifications to the bike, so I returned the item. That being said, they were good saddlebags.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Product Dimensions Not Correct
customer_reviews.text: Good quality would have given it a 5 star but smaller then wanted. Technical Details States. Product Dimensions are 15.5 x 14.6 x 12.4 inches, when I looked in Willie & Max catalog that came with bags the Dimensions are only 12 x 9.5 x 5.5 Wanted larger bags but these will do for now
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just put these bags on my 06 Xl1200R sportster, good fit, no need to move signals back. Quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: The saddle bags are good value for money, yet to be tested in rain so not sure how waterproof they are. Could do with better instructions on how to tie the laces up, not very clear for someone who has never done it before. Photographs at various stages would be better than basic line drawings, better still an instructional 'how to video' on W&M website. I'm still not sure if I have tied them correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Time and time
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and were perfect for what I was looking for. It took some time to install them just too get them sized right on the bike.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are fairly well made and should last awhile. Mounted them on a 2015 Honda Shadow Phantom 750- mounted fairly easily, pretty tight fit but OK.
customer_reviews.author: R. Powers

customer_reviews.title: A Great Saddlebag!
customer_reviews.text: Needed saddlebags for my Honda Rebel and I did a lot of looking. I even bought a set from a different company but didn’t like them so I sent them back. Then I found these. Compact but holds enough for me. Also, they fit the Rebel with no problems. If you’re looking for a bag that looks great on a small Rebel and not “overpowering” then this will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 2004 harley sportster 1200 roadster and is exactly what i wanted fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tiny, but well made.
customer_reviews.text: These bags look great on my V-star 650, though they really are tiny. I can barely fit my work out gear in them for the gym, one shoe per side (women's 9 will take up the whole bottom of one). I read the measurements and what not, just assumed they'd hold more, I guess. However, buyer error aside, these are well made and very attractive. I may get the bigger ones if I get tired of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great just the thing my bike needed
customer_reviews.author: Branden

customer_reviews.title: Cool bags, not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work on my 2001 honda shadow spirit 750. can't get the bags to sit evenly on both sides, they end up flying up when the wind catches a lifted corner. They're cool bags otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Lucian M. Ionescu

product_meta.title: Dowco Willie & Max 58701-20 Braided Series: Synthetic Leather Standard Slant Motorcycle Saddlebag Set, Black, Universal Fit, 15 Liter Each/30 Liter Total Capacity
product_meta.description: Size:StandardThe Willie & Max Slant Saddlebag Sets feature quick release buckles, zip off yokes and removable carry handles and plastic reinforcing for superior shape retention. The bags are made with 12 oz UV and water resistant vinyl to stand up to the toughest elements and the interior is supported with a plastic liner to help keep the bag from sagging. The quick release buckles hold the outer flap down while the black buckles give a modern look to the bags. Includes two bags and throwover system with zip off yokes. All of the bags are both designed and manufactured in the USA. Limited Lifetime Warranty.
feature_bullets: Sewn-in handles for easy transfer from the bike
